title: Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Amy’s Son Has First Hip-Hop Dance Class
itunes:title: Lunchbox Guesses Weight + Amy’s Son Has First Hip-Hop Dance Class
description:
Lunchbox guesses listeners’ weight just by speaking to the on the phone. Amy recaps her son’s first hip-hop dance class. New artist Caylee Hammack stops by. Also, Bobby calls Shay Mooney from Dan + Shay to discuss their Grammy win. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
